name: Pong (itch) (KingKunta)
description:
A recreation of the classic game - Pong.

Minimal resolution with the original GameBoy color palette.

Game includes local multiplayer and single player vs. the CPU. Player 1 uses the 'w' and 's' keys, while player 2 uses the up and down keys. When playing single player, a controller can be plugged in and the left stick can be used to control the paddle. The CPU difficulty can be changed in the settings menu, with 3 possible options.
